titleInfo.title: Towards open data for linguistics: Lexical Linked Data
New Trends of Research in Ontologies and Lexical Resources

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Chiarcos, Christian, McCrae, John, Cimiano, Philipp, and Fellbaum, Christiane. 2013. “Towards open data for linguistics: Lexical Linked Data”. In New Trends of Research in Ontologies and Lexical Resources, ed. Alessandro Oltramari, Piek Vossen, Lu Qin, and Eduard Hovy, 7-25. Berlin, Heidelberg: Springer.
